General.Name: X1 Esports and Entertainment Ltd.
General.Description: X1 Entertainment Group Inc., an esports portfolio company, engages in the gaming, esports, media, and entertainment businesses. It owns and operates RixGG, an esports franchise; X1 Talent, a boutique talent management group for digital content creators; ShiftRLE, an online news outlet focused on the popular video game Rocket League; and Octane.GG, an online fan statistics platform focused on the Rocket League video game. X1 Esports and Entertainment Ltd. is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 800 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2V6
